headline: 2 from Lucas County named to state posts
sentences: Kathleen L. Fischer of Sylvania was reappointed to the Banking Commission for a term that started Friday and ends Jan. 31, 2026, the announcement from the governor's office late last week said.
In a separate action, Kathryn Elizabeth Shelley of Toledo was appointed to the Ohio Statewide Independent Living Council.
Her term began Friday and ends Oct. 26, 2024, the announcement said.
Two Lucas County residents are on a list of Ohioans named by Gov.
Mike DeWine to state boards, commissions, and councils.
